front.title: BGP Attributes for Multicast Tree Construction

abstract.t: The Multiprotocol Extensions for BGP-4 [MBGP] allow Network LayerReachability Information to contain prefixes used for multicastforwarding. This document defines extensions to BGP-4 [BGP-4] which canbe used to annotate such prefixes with information that can be used bymulticast routing protocols when constructing trees.
